title: [Large-scale] Strategies to Enhance Mathematics Achievement in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and fundamental proficiency in online learning platform utilization
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments utilizing personal devices to strengthen mathematics competencies connected to social domain job requirements

learning_goals: Analyzing factors (self-regulated learning, self-efficacy, online learning) influencing mathematical achievement using structural equation modeling (SEM)
Improving problem-solving efficiency by 30% or more through self-regulation in online learning environments
Diagnosing learners' psychological factors using a mathematical learning self-efficacy measurement tool and proposing improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
